main event: A witness reported seeing two unidentified flying objects in Riverside, California on April 8, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were described as disk-shaped and silver in color., Witness observed the objects for a duration of about 30 seconds to 1 minute 15 seconds., The objects appeared suddenly, hovered, and then disappeared., The witness reported the objects being brighter than the known stars and much faster than a jet., No sound was associated with the sighting.
witness description: The witness saw the objects while playing with a friend and was looking through a window.
